name: deviceState_getRemainingTime
description: This function is used to query the remaining time for a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to query the remaining time.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action to query the remaining time.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to query the remaining time.
